full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RJE RIN PO CHE LA BRTEN PA'I ME TOG SGRUB TSUL MDOR BSDUS GSER GYI ME TOG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(ZHES RJE BLA MA LA BRTEN NAS ME TOG SGRUB TSUL GSER GYI ME TOG CES BYA BA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MANG DU THOS PA'I MCHOG GYUR TH'ON BLA MA DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS LTA GOS BCAS BSKUL MA BYUNG YANG, 'DI RIGS GSAR RTZOM LA RANG BZO'I NYES PA 'BYUNG NYEN CHE MOD, SKU'I RJES GNANG GI SKABS 'BRU LTAR DMIGS NAS 'THOR BA DANG RIL BU SGRUB TSUL LA KHA BSGYUR LTA BU SONG BA SHIS 'GA' BA MED DAM SNYAM NAS NGO MA BZLOG TZAM DU BRIS SHING, BSKUL BA PO YANG 'BYOR MA THAG GRVA BA GZHAN ZHIG GIS KYANG GSER GYI ME TOG GSAR BA KHYER BYUNG BA'I DGA' SPRO DANG BCAS LA RTA TSAG PA BA, DBANG BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SHING 'BRUG GI ZLU TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN,
